alert.note: Alert for Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 3:33PM CDT until June 08 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Chicot County in southeastern Arkansas... Northern Washington County in northwestern Mississippi... Southern Bolivar County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 333 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over McGehee, or 9 miles southwest of Rohwer, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Scott and Lamont around 350 PM CDT. Benoit around 355 PM CDT. Shaw around 405 PM CDT. Cleveland and Boyle around 410 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Beulah, Pace and Halley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
